title: red/wrong systray icon
body:
**Describe the bug**
A red/wrong systray icon is shown rather than a proper icon. Other than that everything is OK.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Start teams-for-linux
2. See systray red/wrong icon

**Expected behavior**
A proper icon (the same proper icon shown in the menu app).

**Screenshots**
Systray icon between two proper icons:
![immagine](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fae621ee-152e-4669-91cc-94ebe594561d)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu MATE 24.04
 - Installation package: snap
 - Version: tested with 1.9.6 and 1.10.2

**Debug**
Terminal output:
```
$ teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
No config file found, using default values
all good with appLogLevels you aren't using them
Initialising logger with config: "{}"
Logger initialised with transports: {}

16:31:11.143 › Console logging enabled with level silly
16:31:11.143 › Logger initialised
16:31:11.143 › configPath: /home/user/snap/teams-for-linux/671/.config/teams-for-linux
16:31:11.144 › configFile: {}
dbus-send: /snap/teams-for-linux/671/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdbus-1.so.3: version `LIBDBUS_PRIVATE_1.12.20' not found (required by dbus-send)
Gtk-Message: 16:31:11.200: Failed to load module "xapp-gtk3-module"
Gtk-Message: 16:31:11.201: Failed to load module "appmenu-gtk-module"

(teams-for-linux:141796): Gtk-WARNING **: 16:31:11.218: Theme parsing error: gtk.css:1413:23: 'font-feature-settings' is not a valid property name

(teams-for-linux:141796): Gtk-WARNING **: 16:31:11.225: Theme parsing error: gtk.css:3286:25: 'font-feature-settings' is not a valid property name

  '/snap/teams-for-linux/671/teams-for-linux',
  '--webDebug',
  '--logConfig={}',
  '--no-sandbox'
]

[141796:0923/163111.783745:ERROR:object_proxy.cc(576)] Failed to call method: org.freedesktop.login1.Manager.Inhibit: object_path= /org/freedesktop/login1: org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.AccessDenied: An AppArmor policy prevents this sender from sending this message to this recipient; type="method_call", sender=":1.1993" (uid=1000 pid=141796 comm="/snap/teams-for-linux/671/teams-for-linux --webDeb" label="snap.teams-for-linux.teams-for-linux (enforce)") interface="org.freedesktop.login1.Manager" member="Inhibit" error name="(unset)" requested_reply="0" destination="org.freedesktop.login1" (uid=0 pid=1283 comm="/usr/lib/systemd/systemd-logind" label="unconfined")
```
